title: Mental illness not to blame for gun violence, study finds

title_detail.value: Mental illness not to blame for gun violence, study finds

summary: Counter to a lot of public opinion, having a mental illness does not necessarily make a person more likely to commit gun violence. According to a new study, a better indicator of gun violence was access to firearms.

summary_detail.value: Counter to a lot of public opinion, having a mental illness does not necessarily make a person more likely to commit gun violence. According to a new study, a better indicator of gun violence was access to firearms.
